references.reason: This paper provides a foundational overview of simulation-based inference (SBI), which is the core methodology of the current work.

references.paper_title: Simulation intelligence: Towards a new generation of scientific methods
references.reason: This work offers a broader perspective on simulation-based reasoning, highlighting its potential and challenges in scientific research.

references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This highly influential paper introduces score-based generative models, which are fundamental to consistency models and serve as a basis for the current work's methodology.
This paper introduces consistency models, the core algorithm used in the current work for fast and efficient inference.

references.paper_title: Flow matching for scalable simulation-based inference
references.reason: This work presents a state-of-the-art method in SBI that is closely related to the current work and serves as a key competitor for comparison.
